# Metadata Update for PR Integration

This micro PR prepares the repository metadata to smoothly integrate the large `feature/hardcode-ports-constants` PR.

## Changes

### 1. PR Templates
- ✅ Updated `.github/pull_request_template.md` with port hardcoding requirement
- ✅ Added `.github/PR-DESCRIPTION-template.md` for comprehensive PR descriptions
- ✅ Added `.github/PR-LABELS.md` guide with color palette

### 2. Label Definitions
- ✅ Added `.github/labels.json` for GitHub label automation
- ✅ Bright colored labels matching Telegram integration patterns

### 3. Benefits
- **Smooth Integration**: Large PR can merge without metadata conflicts
- **Consistent Styling**: Labels ready with bright colors matching Telegram patterns
- **Better PRs**: Templates guide contributors to include all necessary information
- **Auto-closing**: Closing keywords configured for issue automation

## Usage

After this PR merges, the large PR will have:
- ✅ Proper PR template with updated checklist
- ✅ Label guide for consistent labeling
- ✅ Closing keywords for auto-closing issues
- ✅ Metadata ready for review
